mapper.select: select cl.conn_lesson_no, cl.lesson_no, fl.lesson_title, m.user_id, fl.lesson_subject, fl.lesson_loc, fl.max_people from connected_lesson cl, find_lesson fl, membership m where cl.lesson_no = fl.lesson_no and m.user_no = cl.student and cl.teacher = #{teaNo} and cl.is_connected = 1 group by cl.conn_lesson_no, cl.lesson_no, fl.lesson_title, m.user_id, fl.lesson_subject, fl.lesson_loc, fl.max_people order by cl.lesson_no
